titleInfo.title: Strangeness in Inter-Religious Classroom Communication: Research on the 'Gift-to-the-Child' Material
Education, Religion and Society. Essays in Honour of John M. Hull

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Streib, H.: Strangeness in Inter-Religious Classroom Communication: Research on the 'Gift-to-the-Child' Material. In: Bates, D., Durka, G., and Schweitzer, F. (eds.)
